title.narrative: Support for Local Governance in Uruzgan (SLGU)

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative is to support Afghanistan's Uruzgan Province face major development challenges specifically ongoing and active conflict. The capacity of government to deliver services to the people of Uruzgan needs to be rapidly boosted to meet immediate needs and to help promote stability. SLGU aims to strengthen systems and processes, improve the competency of staff, and align government capacity with priorities under the Provincial Development Plan. The total value of this initiative is $8.6 million over 3 years, starting 2010-11.
